name: Polo's PlayGroup (2021)
description:
-------------------------------POLOS PLAYGROUP----------------- Welcome to Polo Pandas PlayWorld, children play time wont get better

than Polos! With over 20 years of service, Polos PlayWorld was founded

in 1978 by Frank Luger as a small birthday party service. Along the way

ideas for characters to represent his business began.

With help from co-owner George Milton they came up with the concept of

4 characters, Polo Panda, LeeJo Lemur, Remy Otter & Simon Polar Bear.

starting out they were costumes warn by the employees. during 1981 Polos became a children's fast food restaurant. Later the 4 characters were brought to life as animatronic entertainers! Bringing the fun to life, loved by many children Polo Panda stands as the best place for kids.

During 1996 Polos was rated the best fast food service next to Randy Razbergs Children Café. In a contest of best burgers Polos came out as #1

world wide!

Frank Luger passed shortly after 1998, leaving his loving characters the pride of entertaining children till the end!

---------------------------------GAMEPLAY----------------------------------

Polos PlayGroup contains 15 minigames that players must complete. A level progression system allows players to unlock new games as they win! Finish all minigames to get your certificate & most importantly the skills to work in a team!

Mouse and WASD keys are used during gameplay, instructions are given to the player to follow.

---------------------------MEET THE ENTERTAINERS---------------------------

Polo Panda:

A cuddly panda named Polo stars as the main character & the lead keyboard player in his band. He is a cheerful, happy panda who loves to eat with his friends!

LeeJo Lemur:

LeeJo is a cheeky Lemur who loves to play but often gets himself into trouble, he plays in the band as a lead singer alongside Polo & Remy!

Remy Otter:

The girl of the team stars as a 2nd singer with her friends Polo & LeeJo! She enjoys eating with friends & story telling!

---------------OTHER STUFF ABOUT GAME---------------------------

This game has a mix of scary & fun minigames. Polos PlayGroup is NOT apart of the Those Nights at Randy's series.

Polos PlayGroup is its own series separate from Randys.
